templates.question: What is the category with the biggest sales opportunity?
templates.desc: The category or genre with the biggest or most sales opportunity overall
templates.query: SELECT TOP 1 CATEGORY_LABEL      , SUM(OPPS) AS OPPORTUNITY FROM ARMETA_AI.DASHBOARD.STORY_SALES_ACCELERATOR SA  JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_CATEGORY                C    ON SA.CATEGORY_CD = C.CATEGORY_CD  WHERE IS_ACTIVE = TRUE     AND OPPS IS NOT NULL  GROUP BY CATEGORY_LABEL ORDER BY opportunity DESC

templates.question: What is the category with the biggest sales opportunity at STATE/DISTRICT?
templates.desc: The category or genre with the biggest or most sales opportunity at the state/district level
templates.query: WITH Find_DistrictName AS (     SELECT TOP 1             DISTRICT_LABEL          , REGEXP_SUBSTR(DISTRICT_DESC, '[a-zA-Z]+') AS DISTRICT_DESC     FROM   ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_DISTRICT D     WHERE  RTRIM(LTRIM(LOWER(DISTRICT_DESC))) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER('STATE/DISTRICT'), '%')), Find_TopCategory AS (     SELECT CATEGORY_LABEL          , DISTRICT_LABEL          , SUM(OPPS) AS OPPORTUNITY     FROM ARMETA_AI.DASHBOARD.STORY_SALES_ACCELERATOR SA      JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_CATEGORY                C  ON SA.CATEGORY_CD = C.CATEGORY_CD     JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_DISTRICT                D  ON SA.DISTRICT_CD = D.DISTRICT_CD                      WHERE OPPS IS NOT NULL      GROUP BY CATEGORY_LABEL, DISTRICT_LABEL     ORDER BY OPPORTUNITY DESC ) SELECT TOP 1         CONCAT('The category with the biggest sales opportunity in '             , DN.DISTRICT_DESC             , ' is '             , CATEGORY_LABEL             , ' with $'             , LTRIM(TO_VARCHAR(IFNULL(MAX(OPPORTUNITY),0), '999,999,999,990'))             , ' opportunity.'         ) AS RESULTS FROM Find_DistrictName DN JOIN Find_TopCategory  TC ON DN.DISTRICT_LABEL = TC.DISTRICT_LABEL GROUP BY DN.DISTRICT_DESC, CATEGORY_LABEL

templates.question: What is the category with the biggest sales opportunity at STORE/LOCATION/CITY?
templates.desc: The category or genre with the biggest or most sales opportunity at the city/store/location level
templates.query: WITH Find_LocationName AS (SELECT TOP 1             LOCATION_LABEL          , REGEXP_SUBSTR(LOCATION_DESC, '[a-zA-Z]+') AS LOCATION_DESC     FROM   ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION L     WHERE  RTRIM(LTRIM(LOWER(LOCATION_DESC))) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER('STORE/LOCATION/CITY'), '%') ), Find_TopCategory AS (     SELECT CATEGORY_LABEL          , LOCATION_LABEL          , SUM(OPPS) AS OPPORTUNITY     FROM ARMETA_AI.DASHBOARD.STORY_SALES_ACCELERATOR SA      JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_CATEGORY                C  ON SA.CATEGORY_CD = C.CATEGORY_CD     JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION                L  ON SA.LOCATION_CD = L.LOCATION_CD                      WHERE OPPS IS NOT NULL      GROUP BY CATEGORY_LABEL, LOCATION_LABEL     ORDER BY OPPORTUNITY DESC ) SELECT TOP 1         CONCAT('The category with the biggest sales opportunity in '             , LN.LOCATION_DESC             , ' is '             , CATEGORY_LABEL             , ' with $'             , LTRIM(TO_VARCHAR(IFNULL(MAX(OPPORTUNITY),0), '999,999,999,990'))             , ' opportunity.'         ) AS RESULTS FROM     Find_LocationName LN JOIN     Find_TopCategory  TC ON LN.LOCATION_LABEL = TC.LOCATION_LABEL GROUP BY LN.LOCATION_DESC, CATEGORY_LABEL

templates.question: What is the opportunity at STORE/LOCATION/CITY?
templates.desc: The sales opportunity or missed sales at the city/store/location level
templates.query: WITH Find_LocationName AS (     SELECT TOP 1             LOCATION_LABEL          , REGEXP_SUBSTR(LOCATION_DESC, '[a-zA-Z]+') AS LOCATION_DESC     FROM   ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION L     WHERE  RTRIM(LTRIM(LOWER(LOCATION_DESC))) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER('STORE/LOCATION/CITY'), '%') ), Find_Opportunity AS (     SELECT LOCATION_LABEL          , SUM(OPPS) AS OPPORTUNITY     FROM ARMETA_AI.DASHBOARD.STORY_SALES_ACCELERATOR SA      JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION                L  ON SA.LOCATION_CD = L.LOCATION_CD                      WHERE OPPS IS NOT NULL      GROUP BY LOCATION_LABEL     ORDER BY OPPORTUNITY DESC ) SELECT TOP 1         CONCAT('The sales opportunity in '             , LN.LOCATION_DESC             , ' is  $'             , LTRIM(TO_VARCHAR(IFNULL(MAX(OPPORTUNITY),0), '999,999,999,990'))             , '.'         ) AS RESULTS FROM     Find_LocationName LN JOIN     Find_Opportunity  TC ON LN.LOCATION_LABEL = TC.LOCATION_LABEL GROUP BY LN.LOCATION_DESC

templates.question: What is the opportunity at STATE/DISTRICT?
templates.desc: The sales opportunity or missed sales at the STATE/DISTRICT level
templates.query: WITH Find_DistrictName AS (     SELECT TOP 1             District_LABEL          , REGEXP_SUBSTR(DISTRICT_DESC, '[a-zA-Z]+') AS DISTRICT_DESC     FROM   ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_DISTRICT D     WHERE  RTRIM(LTRIM(LOWER(DISTRICT_DESC))) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER('STATE/DISTRICT'), '%') ), Find_Opportunity AS (     SELECT DISTRICT_LABEL          , SUM(OPPS) AS OPPORTUNITY     FROM ARMETA_AI.DASHBOARD.STORY_SALES_ACCELERATOR SA      JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_DISTRICT                 D ON D.DISTRICT_CD = SA.DISTRICT_CD                WHERE OPPS IS NOT NULL      GROUP BY DISTRICT_LABEL     ORDER BY OPPORTUNITY DESC ) SELECT TOP 1         CONCAT('The sales opportunity in '             , DN.DISTRICT_DESC             , ' is  $'             , LTRIM(TO_VARCHAR(IFNULL(MAX(OPPORTUNITY),0), '999,999,999,990'))             , '.'         ) AS RESULTS FROM     Find_DistrictName DN JOIN     Find_Opportunity  TC ON DN.District_LABEL = TC.district_label GROUP BY DN.DISTRICT_DESC

templates.question: What is the opportunity on BRAND at STORE/LOCATION/CITY?

templates.question: Which city/cities have the highest concentration of inventory of BRAND right now?

templates.desc: A list of stores and the inventory amounts of a specific brand in both units and dollars at the city/store/location level filtered by inventory amounts descending

templates.question: Which store/stores have the highest concentration of inventory of BRAND right now?
templates.desc: A list of stores and the inventory amounts of a specific brand in both units and dollars at the city/store/location level filtered by inventory amounts descending

templates.question: Which state/states have the highest concentration of inventory of BRAND right now?
templates.desc: A list of districts and the inventory amounts of a specific brand in both units and dollars at the state/district level filtered by inventory amounts descending

templates.question: Which district/districts have the highest concentration of inventory of BRAND right now?
templates.desc: A list of districts and the inventory amounts of a specific brand in both units and dollars at the state/district level filtered by inventory amounts descending

templates.question: Which BRAND was our biggest missed opportunity last month?
templates.desc: A single BRAND that represents the most or biggest opportunity or missed sales in all cities/stores/locations/states/districts

templates.question: Which BRAND was our biggest missed opportunity last month in STORE/LOCATION/CITY?
templates.desc: A single BRAND that represents the most or biggest opportunity or missed sales at the cities/stores/locations level

templates.desc: A single BRAND that represents the most or biggest opportunity or missed sales at the states/districts level
